snippet: The latest ruling in O’Bannon vs. N.C.A.A., in which athletes’ compensation is at stake, leaves both sides claiming victory.
abstract: Greg Bishop On College Sports column examines latest ruling in O'Bannon vs NCAA, lawsuit over compensation for college athletes, which certified lawsuit as class action but prohibits assignment of damages; notes that decision was claimed by both sides as a victory.
lead_paragraph: The latest ruling in O’Bannon vs. N.C.A.A., in which athletes’ compensation is at stake, leaves both sides claiming victory.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Dodges a Bullet, but Change Is on the Way
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Dodges a Bullet, But Change Is on the Way
